Back to Sergei Rachmaninoff

Sergei Rachmaninoff

Daisies, op. 38 no. 3

c. 1924

[IMSLP]

This is an arrangement by Rachmaninoff of his song for voice and piano, which was originally written in 1916.

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 3
